description:
The image is a promotional graphic for a platform called Chatbase, which offers AI agents designed to create magical customer experiences. The left side of the image features bold black text that reads, "AI agents for magical customer experiences." Below this, in smaller gray text, it says, "Chatbase is the complete platform for building & deploying AI support agents for your business."

Underneath this description, there is a black button with white text that says, "Build your agent." Next to the button, in smaller gray text, it states, "No credit card required."

On the right side of the image, there is a colorful gradient background with vertical stripes in shades of pink, purple, and orange. Over this background, there is a white rectangular box labeled "Sources" with a plus sign and the text "Add source" inside it.

At the bottom of the image, there is a line of text that reads, "Trusted by 9000+ business worldwide," followed by logos of several companies: SIEMENS, POSTMAN, pwc, talpian, Opal, and alBaraka.
